Author: foxx_ghost
Text: I was telling my SO that I felt fat, I work in an office with honesty obese people one lady said she went to the doctor and was sad when she was only 300lbs) so now when I say I feel fat (I’m 125lbs btw, not fat just not the best self esteem) he will ask me if I’m smaller than the people I work with, when I say yes he will say “then you’re not fat”   I still feel unhappy with how I look though. 🙃

Author: RotundToRadient
Text: Dude, this is my husband to a T. Whether it's my body image or my sex drive, somehow it always circles back to being about him not being good enough or attractive enough or attentive enough.  I get that it's probably his own insecurities making him feel that way but I can only tell him otherwise so many times before it feels like hes ignoring me or thinks I'm lying 😒
